meta.title: Bnlang shomporke — Bangladesh-er matri-vashay programming
meta.description: Bnlang holo ekta multilingual programming language aar runtime ja Bangladesh-er jonno toiri. Bangla, Banglish, othoba English-e likhun ekta modern toolchain, shohoje shikhar poth aar production-grade interop shoho.

hero.title: Bnlang shomporke
hero.lead: Bnlang muloto Bangladesh-er jonno toiri ekta multilingual programming language aar runtime. Eta developer-der matri-vasha—Bangla—te vabte aar shikhte, Banglish-e ekshathe kaj korte aar English-e publish korte dey, kono semantics, tooling, ba production readiness change na korei.

bullets.text: bnl-vscode, bnl-web (website), aar bpm open source.
Main Bnlang runtime source ekhon private; pore open source kora hobe.

why.title: Keno Bnlang (Bangladesh-er jonno)
why.description: Manush bibhinno vashay vabey aar kaj kore—Bangla-te shikhay, Banglish-e discuss kore, English-e khuje aar publish kore. Traditional language shudhu ekta surface form use korte dey; Bnlang apnake adapt kore. Shikhun, prototype korun, production-e run korun nijer shubidajoggo script-e—ecosystem fork na kore ba engineering-er rigor na hariye.

bullets.text: ekoi example tinṭi surface form-e paoa jabe—English, Bangla, aar Banglish—ekoi behavior shoho.
diagnostics aar formatting code-ke mix-language-eo readable aar consistent rakhbe.
Bangla-te core idea shikhun, dorkar hole English-e production-e pathan.

contextCard.title: Ei page-e ki royeche (aar keno)
contextCard.body: Protiti section language design, runtime, interop, aar community-r karon bujhiye dey. Eta teacher, adopter, aar contributor-der jonno jaader real project-e Bnlang assess kora dorkar.

mission.title: Mission (keno dorkar)
mission.body: Bangladesh-e professional software development-ke shohojgrohojoggo kora—kichu simplify na kore. Bangla/Banglish-e vabun aar shikhun, aar emon software build korun ja global engineering standard mene cholbe.

vision.title: Vision (safollo kemon hobe)
vision.body: Language thik korbena ke build korte parbe. Saphollo hobe ekta healthy ecosystem jekhane school, startup, aar government institution-gulo confidence shoho Bnlang use korbe—stable release aar open governance-er support shoho.

how.title: Kibhabe kaj kore (aar keno)
how.lead: Amra Bangladesh-er jonno ekta pragmatic stack niyechi: modern V8 runtime-e fast iteration, performance-critical part-e C++-er shoho clear interop, aar strong library (libuv, OpenSSL, llhttp, zlib)—jate school aar company gulo step by step adopt korte pare.

frontend.title: Frontend: Lexer, Parser, Checker
points: Scope, arity, optional type hint-er jonno static check.
Formatter deterministic layout ensure kore script jure.

backend.title: Backend: V8 Runtime
points: IR → JavaScript transpile hoy; Google V8 engine-e execute hoy.
Module resolution BPM + lockfile shoho reproducible build-er jonno.
Source map aar readable diagnostics debug-e first-class support dey.

native.title: Native Path: C++
points: Performance-critical function (crypto, parsing, image ops) C++-e implement kora.
Stable ABI boundary prebuilt binary shoho protiti platform-er jonno.
FFI helper shoho system library safe vabe call kora jay.

items.name: V8
items.desc: High-performance JavaScript engine transpiled code execute korar jonno

items.name: libuv
items.desc: Event loop, async I/O, cross-platform primitive

pillars.title: Packages & Stdlib (keno)
pillars.body: BPM integrity check aar semantic version dey. Standard library I/O, HTTP, crypto aar text utility cover kore ekoi API shoho tinṭi surface form-e—jate lesson fragment na hoy.

pillars.title: Tooling (keno)
pillars.body: Formatter, test runner, docs generator aar scaffolding language-er shathe ship kore. Classroom aar CI-te upgrade predictable thake karon tool gulo ekshathe evolve kore.

pillars.title: Interop (keno wall garden noy)
pillars.body: Existing C/C++ library leverage korun; clean interface export korun. JavaScript-e transpile korun aar V8-e run korun wide deployment-er jonno.

languageDesign.title: Language design (keno thik mone hoy)
languageDesign.lead: Parser tinṭi surface form accept kore; compiler segulo ke equal vabe treat kore. Apni ja vashay vabchen shei vashay shikhun aar kaj korun—kon special mode chara.

cards.title: Trilingual keyword & API
cards.body: Control flow aar declaration Bangla/Banglish/English-e ache; tooling analysis aar output-er jonno normalize kore.

cards.title: Safety & clarity
cards.body: Explicit import, predictable scoping, strict formatter aar readable error review-ke logic-e focus kore.

cards.title: Accessibility-first
cards.body: Unicode-safe punctuation, common Bangla keyboard habit-er shathe aligned example aar bilingual diagnostic.

cards.title: Language reality
cards.body: Bangla-te shikhun, Banglish-e discuss korun, English-e search korun. Bnlang shob support kore kono 'mode switching' chara.

cards.title: Font & Unicode
cards.body: Compiler aar formatter Bangla punctuation/number handle kore; docs easily available font recommend kore.

cards.title: Low bandwidth & power
cards.body: Choto download, deterministic install, aar offline docs real classroom-e friction komay.

adoption.title: Interop & adoption (keno notun kore banaben na)

cards.title: Import / Export
cards.body: Existing C/C++ library use korun; clean interface export korun. Runtime support thakle kono platform-e deploy kora jabe.

cards.title: Step by step migration
cards.body: Prothome script ba ekta service diye start korun; baki part existing language-e thakuk. Hot path sudhu dorkar hole C++-e nin.

cards.title: Deterministic build
cards.body: Lockfile aar checksum CI aar lab machine-e ekoi vabe kaj korbe—even flaky connectivity-teo.

trust.title: Governance, license & security (keno trust kora jabe)

cards.title: Open governance
cards.body: Community RFC change shape kore. Breaking change migration guide aar tool support shoho ase.

cards.title: Licensing
cards.body: bnl-vscode, bnl-web aar bpm open source; main runtime source ekhon private (open source korar plan ache). Shob free to use.

cards.title: Security & telemetry
cards.body: Responsible disclosure, signed artifact, aar optional privacy-respecting telemetry (jokon khushi opt-out kora jabe).

cards.title: v1.x stability
cards.body: Core syntax lock korun, stdlib module finalize korun, aar LTS window announce korun shikkhok aar company-der jonno.

cards.title: Tooling depth
cards.body: Language server polish, better editor integration, aar improved debug/trace ergonomics.

cards.title: Native performance
cards.body: C++ module expand korun, hot path profile korun, aar shob supported OS/arch pair-er jonno prebuilt binary provide korun.

community.title: Community & governance
community.lead: Discussion-e jog din, RFC propose korun, aar roadmap shape korte help korun. Documentation theke core package porjonto—protita obodan important.

status.title: Project-er obostha
status.body: bnl-vscode, bnl-web (website), aar bpm open source aar free. Main Bnlang runtime source ekhon private (open source korar plan ache).

cost.title: Cost
cost.body: Bnlang distribution aar tooling completely free to use—no license fee, no hidden charge. Individual, school aar company gulo eta adopt korte parbe kono cost barrier chara, jate eta learning, collaboration aar production deployment shohoje access kora jay.

runtimeStack.name: C++
runtimeStack.desc: Bnlang runtime-er core, modern C++-e lekha speed aar portability-er jonno. Eta native extension, FFI bridge aar low-level system integration power kore.

runtimeStack.name: V8
runtimeStack.desc: Google-er high-performance JavaScript engine. Bnlang JavaScript-e transpile hoy aar V8-e run kore, JIT compilation aar fast GC shoho.

runtimeStack.name: libuv
runtimeStack.desc: Cross-platform async I/O library. Bnlang-e networking, filesystem, timer, event loop aar process management-e use kora hoy.

runtimeStack.name: OpenSSL
runtimeStack.desc: TLS, SSL aar cryptography dey. Bnlang use kore secure communication, encryption, hashing aar certificate handling-er jonno.

runtimeStack.name: llhttp
runtimeStack.desc: Fast, lightweight HTTP parser in C. Bnlang-e integrate kora server aar client-er jonno efficient aar secure HTTP traffic handle korte.

runtimeStack.name: zlib
runtimeStack.desc: Trusted compression library. BPM-e package compression, gzip/deflate support, aar general data processing-e use kora hoy.
